run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientHandler
the run method of the class ClientHandler that handles the messages received from the server when the queue of messages to handle is not empty, it takes the first message from the queue and handles it
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientSocket
run method of the thread that receives messages from the server socket and calls the receiveMessageFromServer method if the message is a ping message it cancels the ping timer and creates a new one that means that the connection is still active if the thread is interrupted it closes the connection with the server socket
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.PingHandler
the run method of the class PingHandler that prints a message to the client if the ping is not received in time and exits the client
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.ClientPinger
Method that pings the client to check if the connection is still alive or not through the RMI connection if the connection is lost, the client is disconnected from the server, and the thread is interrupted
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
Process that pings all the clients to check if they are still connected
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.SocketConnection
Method that creates the connection through the socket and when the stream is closed it disconnects the client
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.SocketServer
Method that always accepts new socket connections between server and client (server side) and creates a new thread for each connection
